resources.string: Located in the heart of electronic city. All major offices like Wipro, Infosys are just 10-15 mins walk away.
Whitefield needs no introduction. This area in Bangalore has the maximum traffic congestion. Located very next to Pheonix Mall which is a convinient destination for every Banglorean.
Brookefield is closer to Whitefield. Traffic congestion is no less here. Hope Farm Mall is the hub of this locality.
Kormangala is a popular destination for every foodie. We get every exotic dishes here. Also, Kormangala is filled with lots of startup company offices.
